resources.string: This is a basic Bitcoin wallet. It\'s main features include:

* Checking your balance.
* Sending/receiving Bitcoins.
* Requesting Bitcoins.
* Browsing your transaction history.
To begin pick an avatar from below. You can customize it later with your own name and image
The process of downloading blocks \nfrom the Blockchain is in progress.\n As this occurs, the action bar is shown in red.
